bibl.title: Back to the Backstage: The Papyrus P. Berol. 13927. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: A first version of this work was read on the occasion of the Study Day L'attirail dramatique dans les spectacles de l'Antiquité (Nantes, 26 March 2010). Re-examination of the fragment P. Berol. Inv. 13927 (= M.-P.3 2437; LDAB 6079) as an example of the contribution of papyrus documentation to our knowledge on the practical aspects of dramatic performances and stage sets in antiquity.
bibl.seg: PERRONE Sandra, Back to the Backstage: The Papyrus P. Berol. 13927. Avec résumé en anglais.

A first version of this work was read on the occasion of the Study Day L'attirail dramatique dans les spectacles de l'Antiquité (Nantes, 26 March 2010). Re-examination of the fragment P. Berol. Inv. 13927 (= M.-P.3 2437; LDAB 6079) as an example of the contribution of papyrus documentation to our knowledge on the practical aspects of dramatic performances and stage sets in antiquity.
